column1: We love our dogs. They love to race.

column5: Owned/Raced by: G K Turnwald & G A Cleeve

column1: OPA'S DREAM (1) - ran outwards in back straight.
LAKOTA SCOUT (4) - checked by GOLDSTAR CLOVER into bend losing ground. Assessed by vet and cleared of injury.
CARAMEL ROSE (5) - pushed down track early stages losing ground. Checked by GOLDSTAR CLOVER into bend losing ground. Assessed by vet and cleared of injury.
LITTLE LOTTIE (6) - pushed down track by GOLDSTAR CLOVER early stages.

GOLDSTAR CLOVER (7) - ran inwards early stages pushing runners down the track. Again ran inwards into bend checking LAKOTA SCOUT and was then turned sideways after checking CARAMEL ROSE. Assessed by vet and cleared of injury.
KNOW LOGIC (8) - ran wide home turn.
GO GREAT (2) - ran outwards early stages contacting IMPRESSIVE FLASH.
IMPRESSIVE FLASH (4) - contacted by GO GREAT early stages losing ground.
HEIDI HATES RAP (5) - contacted by TWIZEL STORM early stages and lost ground.
TWIZEL STORM (6) - ran inwards contacting HEIDI HATES RAP early stages losing ground. Raced wide home turn.
GOLDSTAR JAY JAY (8) - raced wide home turn.
DON'T CRY JONI (1) - hampered and forced wide around bend.
GOLDSTAR HURLEY (3) - tightened into bend losing ground.
SHOELACE JACK (4) - contacted ZIPPING HOUDINI early stages. Tightened by ZIPPING HOUDINI into bend losing ground.
ZIPPING HOUDINI (5) - contacted SHOELACE JACK early stages. Ran inwards into bend tightening inside runners.
KNOW DOLLARS (6) - raced wide around bend.
GOLDSTAR GALAXIE (7) - lost ground into bend when checked by HOMEBUSH MANDY.
HOMEBUSH MANDY (8) - ran inwards into bend checking GOLDSTAR GALAXIE.
GOLDSTAR SHILOAH (1) - checked by COSMIC MARTY back straight losing ground.
CASH NO STASH (2) - checked by COSMIC MARTY back straight losing ground.
COSMIC MARTY (3) - ran inwards back straight checking CASH NO STASH and GOLDSTAR SHILOAH.
LITTLE SECRET (4) - ran wide home turn.
RIGHT ON TIME (5) - checked by YANIRA BALE into bend becoming unbalanced and losing ground. Ran wide final bend. Assessed by vet and cleared of injury.
YANIRA BALE (6) - ran inwards into bend checking RIGHT ON TIME.
PONTIAC PAT (3) - checked by SEFTON FORCE early stages losing ground.
SEFTON FORCE (4) - ran inwards early stages checking PONTIAC PAT losing ground. Pushed wide into bend.
SMASH GATOR (6) - checked outwards off heels on bend losing ground.
KNOW CRIME (8) - last on settling. Forced very wide on home turn.
GOLDSTAR ASHTON (1) - contacted LAKOTA MICCO early stages.
GOLDSTAR MONTANA (2) - slow to jump. Raced wide home straight.
OPAWA TRAVIS (3) - slow to jump. Hampered by LAKOTA MICCO first bend.

LAKOTA MICCO (4) - contacted GOLDSTAR ASHTON early stages. Dragged BERET GIRL down first bend and ran outwards losing ground. Pushed wide entering back straight. Assessed by vet and cleared of injury.
MY ROSIE (5) - ran wide entering back straight.

BERET GIRL (6) - checked by OPAWA JANE early stages losing ground. Badly dragged down by LAKOTA MICCO first bend losing more ground. Faltered entering final bend and dropped out. Assessed by vet and found to have a shoulder injury.
OPAWA JANE (8) - ran inwards early stages checking BERET GIRL.

column5: Owned/Raced by: Little Brown Jug Syndicate & Opawa Racing

column1: MACEY BAXTER (1) - ran wide home turn.
MULBERRY WILL (2) - ran outwards early stages contacting PUNTERS KIRSTY.
PUNTERS KIRSTY (3) - contacted by MULBERRY WILL early stages.
GOLDSTAR HALSEY (4) - pushed outwards early stages.
SMASH SURPRISE (5) - checked by JAY SPENCER and lost ground on bend.
JAY SPENCER (6) - ran wide around bend checking SMASH SURPRISE.
LAKOTA TONKA (8) - ran very wide home turn. Ran inwards late in run home.
MULBERRY ROCK (1) - ran outwards early stages causing tightening to outside runners.
CURLY BILL (2) - hampered by MULBERRY ROCK early stages.
GOLDSTAR VALE (3) - badly tightened early stages dropping to rear. Checked by PLATONIC AFFAIR back straight losing more ground. Ran wide home turn.
GOLDSTAR FLORA (4) - contacted early stages losing momentum.
PLATONIC AFFAIR (5) - checked by NASSOR early stages losing ground. Ran inwards back straight checking GOLDSTAR VALE and losing ground.
NASSOR (6) - ran inwards checking PLATONIC AFFAIR early stages.
GOLDSTAR CHIEF (2) - tightened into first bend losing momentum.
BORN TASHA (3) - contacted by OPALA BALE in run to first bend. Tightened soon after losing ground. Pushed wide home turn. Contacted by GOLDSTAR BEAU soon after.
GOLDSTAR BEAU (4) - checked by HOLY GRAIL early stages losing ground. Held up for a stride entering first bend. Got on heels final bend losing momentum. Ran wide soon after contacting BORN TASHA.
HOLY GRAIL (5) - ran inwards early stages checking GOLDSTAR BEAU then forced down track by OPALA BALE.
OHOKA CARSEN (6) - slow in early stages. Raced wide entering first bend. Pushed wide home turn.
OPALA BALE (7) - ran inwards in run to first bend forcing HOLY GRAIL down track then contacting BORN TASHA. Caused tightening to inside runners into first bend.
OPAWA CUTIE (8) - raced very wide through the back straight.

column5: Owned/Raced by: AL Hart & KM Taylor
column7: Trained by: AL Hart & KM Taylor

column1: PENNY JANE (1) - contacted by SHANLY STAR in back straight.
GREY WIND (2) - ran outwards back straight pushing runners wider. Tightened on bend as ANDREA SAID ran inwards running outwards in consequence losing ground. Assessed by vet and cleared of injury.
SHANLY STAR (3) - contacted PENNY JANE in back straight.
GOLDSTAR REBEL (4) - pushed outwards by GREY WIND in back straight. Held up into bend losing momentum.
SO FLOSSY (5) - very slow to jump. Pushed wide and checked on bend losing chance. Assessed by vet and cleared of injury.
FROSTY KATE (6) - pushed wide back straight. Pushed wide and checked on bend losing chance. Assessed by vet and cleared of injury.
ANDREA SAID (8) - pushed wide back straight. Angled inwards on bend and dragged down for a stride.

column5: Owned/Raced by: I Pave Opawa Syndicate

column1: GOLDSTAR DAWSON (3) - very slow to jump.
MACADOODLE (5) - contacted by HAZE ADAMS in run to first bend. Pushed wide first bend. Ran wide back straight. Angled outwards late in run home.
MEATLOAF (6) - slow in early stages. Checked by HAZE ADAMS in run to first bend.
HAZE ADAMS (7) - ran inwards in run to first bend contacting MACADOODLE then checked MEATLOAF.

column5: Owned/Raced by: J Paul, N Stefanissin, J Hinton & G Weir

column1: TARAMAKAU (J McInerney) was a late scratching with wrist soreness.
VEGAN EXPRESS (1) - ran wide home turn.
KNOW FAREWELL (3) - last on jumping. Checked outwards off heels around bend losing ground. Assessed by vet and cleared of injury.
OPAL HUNTER (5) - ran wide home turn.
SOZIN'S BLUE (9/4) - checked off heels into bend losing momentum.
